Belthassan had spent some time reviewing the power output of the 
Shadow Destiny's power core. Eventually, it would need to be 
re-arranged...

Belthassan:
Thrust, are you still looking over Commander Daemos?

Thrust:
Affirmative, sir. His status has not changed.

Belthassan:
Slag!! This is not normal!...
And Melchana is still teaching Tankor to use his Crusher Shield...
Thrust, I am going to the Matrix Chamber. I will be meditating. Inform 
me of any change.

Thrust:
Okay. You are going to reach Daemos' spark, right?

Belthassan:
Yes... it is unusual...

Meanwhile, in the training room...

Melchana:
DEPLOY YOUR SLAGGING SHIELDS!!!!!

She fired continously on Tankor. He deployed a forcefield around him 
and gathered all the dustfire fired at him.

Tankor: I'll get you... focus, Tankor, focus...

The energy gathered was then molded as a larger shield. He then 
suddenly rushed at Melchana and threw the crushing energy at her. She 
was forced and held down to the ground.

Melchana:
Good! You progress well!

Tankor:
I take it your praises are either sincere, in which case I should 
doubt your sanity, or sarcastic, and that I must be ready for more...

Melchana:
Make that option number 2!!

She broke free and attacke the massive rhino-bot with her arm-blades.
